chapter_title: MRJT Detailed Flight Planning, En Route Climb, Cruise-Integrated Range, Descent Tables

questions.question:
An aircraft is to fly from A to B a distance of 1500 NM (NGM) using Long Range Cruise (LRC) at FL330.
Aircraft mass at "A" is 58 500 kg
ISA+10째C
50 kt tailwind
What is the TAS and fuel required?
questions.explanation: This question requires reference to CAP 697 cruise tables to determine True Airspeed (TAS) and fuel required for Long Range Cruise (LRC) conditions with specified distance, aircraft mass, temperature deviation, and wind component.

questions.question:
An aircraft is to fly from A to B a distance of 500 NM (NGM) at Mach 0.74 at FL290.
Aircraft mass at "A" is 54400 kg
ISA -20째C
50 kt headwind
What is the TAS and fuel required?
questions.explanation: This question requires reference to CAP 697 cruise tables to determine True Airspeed (TAS) and fuel required for specified Mach number, flight level, aircraft mass, temperature deviation, and headwind component.

questions.question:
Aircraft mass at "A" is 51 200 kg
Aircraft mass at "B" is 48 500 kg
Cruise at Mach 0.78 @ FL350
ISA +20째C
50 kt tailwind
What is the TAS, ground distance and Specific Fuel Consumption?
questions.explanation: This question requires reference to CAP 697 cruise tables to determine True Airspeed (TAS), ground distance, and Specific Fuel Consumption (SFC) considering initial and final aircraft masses, cruise Mach number, flight level, temperature deviation, and tailwind component.

questions.question:
Aircraft mass at "A" is 55 500 kg
OAT -59째C
Cruising using LRC @ FL310
Wind light & variable
The aircraft is to fly for 35 minutes
What is the fuel consumed from "A"?
questions.explanation: This question requires reference to CAP 697 cruise tables to determine fuel consumption for Long Range Cruise (LRC) conditions with specified aircraft mass, outside air temperature, flight level, and flight duration.
